alert.note: Alert for Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:39PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorms approaching Greater Orlando and Kissimmee... including the area attractions and Orlando International Airport... At 1237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Louisa to 6 miles northeast of Auburndale. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Apopka, Altamonte Springs and Ocoee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
